text:
Counsyl is an established healthtech startup that is looking for killer frontend JavaScript folks to:

- Take on full ownership of entire features or product initiatives from conception to release and beyond

- Use the best JS tools in the industry (Angular, React, CoffeeScript, Ember, etc.) to craft, test, and implement beautiful, intuitive presentation layers

- Develop responsive experiences optimized for web, mobile, tablet, etc.

- Make a meaningful impact alongside the best and brightest in the world

Links:

https://www.counsyl.com/careers/frontend-engineer-javascript...

http://www.technologyreview.com/lists/companies/2015/

http://www.inc.com/magazine/201507/jeff-bercovici/can-peter-...
